comments:
Build 20020521

If you have the Preview page open in Install/Update when you update the 
hyperlink colours you will get an Internal Error sent to the log.

STEPS
1) Select Show View -> Install/Update
2) Close the Preview View
3) Reset the Perspective
4) Select the Home Icon on the preview page
5) Select Perspectives-Appearance
6) Change the Hyperlink text colour
7) Error:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
